titles: An ansvver to the case of Roger Price, Esq; and to the reasons offered for setling his wife a joynture out of the mannor of Westbury in the county of Bucks) humbly offered to the consideration of the Parliament, by Mr. George Price, the second son, Mr. Edward Price. Mrs. Ann Price, and Mrs. Rebecca Brandreth, the sons and daughters of Roger Price, Esq; deceased.
notes: Reproduction of original in the National Library of Wales, Aberystwyth, Wales.
